text: Anata gataga moshi minashigo ni taishi, kosei ni shiteyare-so ni mo nainaraba, anata gata ga yoi to omou 2-ri, 3-ri matawa 4-ri no on'na o fure. Daga kohei ni shiteyare-so ni mo nainaraba, tada 1-ri dake ( å¬°Ru ka), matawa anata gata no migite ga shoyu suru mono (dorei no on'na) de gaman shite oki nasai. Ko no koto wa fukosei o yokeru tame, mottomo koseidearu
